definition: incorruptible/honest/inexpensive/to investigate (old)/side wall of a traditional Chinese house (old)
to hire/to rent/to charter/to rent out/to lease out/rent/land tax
house/room/CL:間|间[jian1]/branch of an extended family/classifier for family members (or concubines)

sentences.english: It applies just as well, for example, to the erection, with public funds, of housing for people of low incomes.
sentences.chinese: 例如，動用公共資金興建供低收入家庭居住的廉租房。

sentences.english: Government starts low-rent house projects to help poor people afford houses.
sentences.chinese: 政府啓動廉租房項目爲了幫助貧窮人家買得起住房。

sentences.english: Low-rent housing system is one of the core elements of housing security.
sentences.chinese: 廉租房制度是住房保障的核心內容之一。

sentences.english: We will increase fiscal and tax policy support and set up a sound system of low-rent housing.
sentences.chinese: 加大財稅等政策支持，建立健全廉租房制度。

definition: housing project for low-income urban residents
public housing/dormitory, esp. for unmarried people
to develop as a government project/to construct under the authority of a commission
subsistence allowance/welfare (abbr. for 城市居民最低生活保障[cheng2 shi4 ju1 min2 zui4 di1 sheng1 huo2 bao3 zhang4])
